summary: The diff implements stable storage for backend state variables and adds comprehensive frontend error handling. All four requirements (REQ-1 through REQ-4) appear to be addressed: backend variables are converted to stable storage, a migration module is added, and frontend mutation hooks now include detailed error handling with formatBackendError utility.
